an8.16:1: "Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu dūteyyaṁ gantumarahati. Katamehi aṭṭhahi?
an8.16:2: Yo ve na byathati patvā,parisaṁ uggavādiniṁ;Na ca hāpeti vacanaṁ,na ca chādeti sāsanaṁ.
an8.16:3: Asandiddhañca bhaṇati,Pucchito na ca kuppati;Sa ve tādisako bhikkhu,Dūteyyaṁ gantumarahatī"ti.
